channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘League Of Legends’ Reveals New Champion Ambessa And Her Abilities
item.description: Ambessa, who you’ll likely know from the Arcane show, is coming to League of Legends and her abilities have been revealed.

item.title: The challenge of focus groups for bold ideas

item.title: How AI Can Become A Superpower For Industrial Workers
item.description: A close look at how AI can drive positive business outcomes in industrial settings.

item.title: The Strategy Questions
item.description: My new book (out today) contains more than 500 questions. Here are some to get you started:

item.title: Foundering or floundering?
item.description: Floundering is flopping around and making little progress. A Dutch word for getting mired and lost. Foundering is what we call it when the ship goes d...

item.title: The Road To Commercialization For Quantum-Enabled Photonic Technologies
item.description: To overcome the challenges in commercializing quantum-enabled photonic technologies, we need to develop a multifaceted strategy.

item.title: iOS 18.1—New iPhone Features And Security Updates Arriving Next Week
item.description: Apple’s iOS 18.1 is arriving next week, along with a bunch of game-changing new features, security updates and bug fixes. Here's what you need to know...

item.title: Moving toward ease
item.description: “Ease” isn’t the same as “easy.” In fact, they’re often at odds. Easy work is hardly worth our effort. It can deaden us instead of giving us the chanc...

item.title: Data-Driven Delight: AI Transforming Customer Experience
item.description: New research reveals that, after cybersecurity, customer experience commands the most significant investments in generative AI technologies.

item.title: Confused about good
